publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1489.1 John Scott: OECD Review of Scotland’s Rural Policy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1489) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "providing that the Scottish Government takes action to address the specific policy delivery concerns identified by the OECD including "centralisation and the lack of adequate bottom-up participation", "weak integration", "an overlap of different approaches and agencies" and "the extreme complexity of both the design and the delivery system linked with rural policy"."
